Device.Name: SPLC780D
Device.Description: An SPLC780D Character LCD is a de facto industry standard liquid crystal display (LCD) display device designed for interfacing with embedded systems. These screens come in a variety of configurations including 8x1, which is one row of eight characters, 16x2,20¡Á2 and 20x4, some include backlight provided by a LED.
Device.KeyWord: SPLC780D, LCD, LCD1602, Character LCD, Text LCD, 16x2, 20x2, 20x4, display
